meanings.definition: A small, red insect that feeds on plant juices.
meanings.sent1: I saw a redbug crawling on the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The redbug was spotted on the rose bush.
meanings.sent3: The redbug seemed to be enjoying its fruity feast.
meanings.sent4: The redbug's tiny red body stood out against the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The redbug's presence signaled the start of spring.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is annoying or bothersome.
meanings.sent1: The noisy redbug kept buzzing around my head.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with that redbug at work is exhausting.
meanings.sent3: The redbug's constant interruptions became comical after a while.
meanings.sent4: The redbug of a neighbor's dog barking all night was unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The redbug of a dripping faucet drove me crazy.
